arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Marksman{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} chance to create an arrow storm at the enemy's location, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. You can have up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} active arrow storms.
